comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of math workbooks and y be the number of English workbooks, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINS": [
        "x \geq 40",
        "y \geq 60",
        "x \leq 140",
        "y \leq 170",
        "x + y \geq 200"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 15x + 17y"
}
